translation.en: Yeah! We need to use the bathroom!
translation.ja: トイレに行(い)きたいんだよ

translation.en: Hey, Chrissy. I see you found the smell.
translation.ja: においのもとを見(み)つけたのね

translation.en: I knew you could do it.
translation.ja: できると思(おも)ってた

translation.en: Wait. What the… Where's the toilet?
translation.ja: トイレは どうしたの？
NETFLIX オリジナルショートシリーズ
やったね！　大当(おおあ)たり！
ラッキーラウンジへようこそ

translation.en: Thank you, Miss Fenderson. Enjoy yourself this evening.
translation.ja: フェンダーソンさん楽(たの)しい夜(よる)を
ここって さいこう！
チケットが要(い)る あるよ

translation.en: You need more than that if you wanna party with the high rollers.
translation.ja: そんなんじゃぜんぜん足(た)りない

translation.en: [game] Sorry! Too bad! Sorry! Almost! Too bad!
translation.ja: おっと ざんねんおしい ダメだ

translation.en: Crispy! Combo! Awesome! Crispy! Combo! Perfect score!
translation.ja: いいぞ！　コンボだ！おみごと！　満点(まんてん)だ！

translation.en: You got a lucky penny. Better hang onto it.
translation.ja: 幸運(こううん)のコインだなくさないようにね
幸運(こううん)のコイン
幸運(こううん)をいのるわ

translation.en: Ha! Luck's got nothing to do with it.
translation.ja: 釣(つ)りに運(うん)は関係(かんけい)ない

translation.en: I finally got the white whale!
translation.ja: まぼろしの白(しろ)いクジラだ！
幸運(こううん)のクリシーだ！
ラッキーラウンジへようこそ

translation.en: [announcer] Welcome to the 65th annual Bumper-Ball Championship!
translation.ja: NETFLIX オリジナルショートシリーズ 第(だい)65回(かい)バンパーボール選手権(せんしゅけん) 第(だい)65回(かい)バンパーボール選手権(せんしゅけん)

translation.en: But first, a quick word from our sponsor.
translation.ja: その前(まえ)にコマーシャル

translation.en: I'm gonna go upstairs and do some work.
translation.ja: ２階(かい)で しごとするよ

translation.en: -You're gonna take a nap, aren't you? -What? No!
translation.ja: ひるねでしょ？ まさか

translation.en: Morning, Chrissy. We're babysitting one of your friends today.
translation.ja: おはようきょうはお友達(ともだち)を預(あず)かる

translation.en: I left a snack for you two on the table!
translation.ja: テーブルに おやつがあるわ

translation.en: We've got the match of the century here today, folks!
translation.ja: きょうは世紀(せいき)の戦(たたか)い

translation.en: It's the long-awaited showdown between two fated rivals.
translation.ja: 運命(うんめい)のライバル同士(どうし)の対決(たいけつ)

translation.en: The Mean Green Machines versus the Tin Can Vans!
translation.ja: ミーン･グリーン･マシーンズ対(たい) ティンカン･バンズ

translation.en: Who will take the win? Who will come out on top?
translation.ja: 勝(か)つのはどちらでしょう？

translation.en: The Tin Can Vans have snatched the ball from the offense.
translation.ja: ティンカン･バンズがボールを奪(うば)った

translation.en: They are headed downfield. Look at that fancy wheel work.
translation.ja: みごとなタイヤさばきでゴールへ

translation.en: And goal! It's a goal for the Tin Can Vans!
translation.ja: ティンカン･バンズがゴール！

translation.en: The Mean Greens are left in shock.
translation.ja: 固(かた)まるグリーンズ

translation.en: But they don't leave them a second to celebrate.
translation.ja: しかし時間(じかん)がない

translation.en: Both teams are scrambling. I can barely see the ball, folks!
translation.ja: はげしいボール争(あらそ)いです
見失(みうしな)いました

translation.en: It's been found. The Mean Greens have the ball.
translation.ja: ボールはグリーンズの手(て)に

translation.en: We're off to the races! What a beautiful maneuver.
translation.ja: いよいよヒートアップ

translation.en: Go, Mean Greens! Show 'em who's boss!
This kid's a regular twinkle-tires. Ah-ha! And it's a goal for Green!
translation.ja: 軽(かろ)やかなタイヤワークでグリーンズが決(き)めた！

translation.en: The Vans manage to break away! It looks like a clean--
translation.ja: バンズが突破(とっぱ)！　このまま…

translation.en: Wait a minute. What just happened?
A fan has come onto the field. He's stolen the ball! -Huh? -Can someone get stadium security, please?
translation.ja: ファンが乱入(らんにゅう)してボールを盗(ぬす)んだ　警備員(けいびいん)を！

translation.en: Can no one get their tires on the slippery suspect?
translation.ja: このまま にげられてしまうのか？

translation.en: Oh, they got him. The fan is down!
translation.ja: ようやく止(と)まりました

translation.en: They're really giving him a walloping!

translation.ja: 試合再開(しあいさいかい)！

translation.en: The match is heating up. There's no sign of it slowing down.
translation.ja: 試合(しあい)は さらにヒートアップ
点(てん)の取(と)り合(あ)いです

translation.en: And those victory dances are nothing to sneeze at.
translation.ja: 勝利(しょうり)のダンスも本格的(ほんかくてき)

translation.en: The walls are closing in. There's nowhere left to turn.
translation.ja: 大(だい)ピンチ さあどうする？

translation.en: But wait! A teammate is wide open. Waiting in the wings like an angel.
translation.ja: チームメイトが待(ま)っていました

translation.en: A beautiful pass. And beautifully received.

translation.ja: 私(わたし)はホンキン･ヘンリー！

translation.en: It's all come down to this. One final goal will decide the match.
translation.ja: 最後(さいご)のゴールが勝敗(しょうはい)を分(わ)けます

translation.en: With seconds on the clock, who will take the championship title?
translation.ja: 残(のこ)り数秒(すうびょう)どちらが優勝(ゆうしょう)するのか？

translation.en: It's another mad scramble. The play goes haywire.
translation.ja: またもはげしいもみ合(あ)いです

translation.en: Cars are sent head over wheels.
The ball is in the air. It's anyone's game.
translation.ja: どちらがボールを取(と)るのか

translation.en: It's all over, folks! It's a tie!
translation.ja: なんと引(ひ)き分(わ)けです
引(ひ)き分(わ)け？　チェリー味(あじ)？

translation.en: Oh, look at you two having so much fun together.
translation.ja: ２人とも すごく楽(たの)しそうね

translation.en: Oh, there's only one left. I'll go get some cups so we can split it.
translation.ja: １つしかないからコップに分(わ)けるわ

translation.en: We wouldn't leave you hanging, folks! The match moves into overtime. Winner takes all!
translation.ja: 延長戦(えんちょうせん)は まもなくです勝(か)つのは どちら？

translation.en: Okay. This goes in here. And this…
translation.ja: さて これは こっちね さて これは こっちね NETFLIX オリジナルショートシリーズ さて これは こっちね
ママが隠(かく)れて ごめんね

translation.en: Hop on out of that box, please.
We used to make home movies of you and Cory with this all the time.
translation.ja: コリーとあなたを撮影(さつえい)したビデオよ
クリシーも映(うつ)ってる？

translation.en: [Papa] Here we go! Hi, Chrissy. Say hi to the camera!
translation.ja: クリシーカメラにあいさつして

translation.en: Okay, that was fun. Now I need to get back to--
translation.ja: 楽(たの)しかったわねそろそろ…

translation.en: I just have so much to do.
translation.ja: やることがたくさんある

translation.en: [Papa] Yeah. There's Cory, walking down the hill.
translation.ja: コリーが丘(おか)を下(くだ)ってる

translation.en: Now, when you're hunting a ghost, you have to be very quiet.
translation.ja: オバケをさがすときは音(おと)を立(た)てちゃダメ
はじめてのレストランね

translation.en: And what would Madame like to order?
translation.ja: ご注文は なににします？
子犬(こいぬ)の世話(せわ)は？

translation.en: [Mama laughs] That's right! And what do puppy cars do?
translation.ja: 子犬(こいぬ)のクルマはなにをするの？

translation.en: Now I wonder, who could have made all of this mess?
translation.ja: こんなに散(ち)らかしたのはだあれ？
クリシー竜巻(たつまき)！

translation.en: That's still our Chrissy. Well, I think that was all of them.
translation.ja: いまも変(か)わらない これで全部(ぜんぶ)ね

translation.en: Aw, you excited for Mama and Papa to get home, Cory?
translation.ja: 帰(かえ)ってくるのが楽(たの)しみ？
すごく楽(たの)しみだね

translation.en: Cory, let them through the door! Here, let me grab your bags, dear.
translation.ja: コリー 通(とお)してあげて さあ 荷物(にもつ)を持(も)つわ
さあ 荷物(にもつ)を持(も)つわ どうも

translation.en: [Cory] I wanna see! Let me see!
translation.ja: 見(み)たい　見(み)せてよ

translation.en: Cory, meet your new baby sister, Chrissy.
translation.ja: あなたの妹(いもうと)のクリシーよ

translation.en: I'm gonna show her my toys!
[Papa's mom] These really are special times.
translation.ja: かけがえのない時間(じかん)ね

translation.en: And they go by so fast.
translation.ja: あっというまに過(す)ぎてしまう

translation.en: Mama go back to work now?
How about I hide and you seek?
translation.ja: かくれんぼしましょう
